info.name: Pirate Bay Minimal Dark
info.description: I tinkered around with a simple dark theme for TPB. Only tested in Stylish for Safari on macOS Sierra and I've currently no interest in testing it in anything else. It'll probably just work, there's nothing groundbreaking or complicated in there.
info.additionalInfo: Tested with pirateproxy.vip, but again should work with whatever url you use. Not sure though.
